source: contract eReceipt { string from; string to; string amount; string date; string orderNum; string productName; string notes; function eReceipt(string _from, string _to, string _amount, string _date, string _orderNum, string _productName, string _notes) public { from = _from; to = _to; amount = _amount; date = _date; orderNum = _orderNum; productName = _productName; notes = _notes; } function QueryeReceipt(int index) constant returns (string) { if(index == 0) return date; if(index == 1) return orderNum; if(index == 2) return productName; if(index == 3) return notes; return "Invalid index"; } }
